caption.p: Schematic illustration of DTU-DADS-ASF epidemiological multiscale model (S, Susceptible; L, Latent; Sc, Subclinically infected; Ic, Clinically infected; R, Removed). Colors on map correspond to the different herd types considered (BS, boar studs; FA, farrowing; FF, farrow-to-finish; FI, finisher; FWP, Farrowing-post-weaning; MU, multiplier; PW, post-weaning; PWF, post-weaningâ€”finishing; SEL, nucleus; SP, small production; TR, trade center; WB, wild boars) ( 18).
